We seek partners who we can help by leveraging our analytics expertise  or whose skills, capabilities and/or technology can help us achieve our charitable mission â€“ to prevent ill health, accelerate the path to diagnosis and improve the effectiveness of treatment.

By partnering with us on Million Minds specifically you will help those suffering undiagnosed, with the opportunity to share our unique insight into: 

  • Life as an undiagnosed patient

  • How patients currently manage their symptoms and conditions

  • The pre, during and post diagnosis patient journey 

  • Patient perspective on treatments and therapies

If you are interested in finding out more about being a partner, please contact us at hello@whiteswan.org.uk.
